title: How to take screenshot on Honor 7x
author: Rishit Patel
description: There are multiple methods to take the screenshots on Honor 7x. This post covers 2 different methods of how to take screenshot on Honor 7x.

content.content: Taking a screenshot on Honor 7x is very easy. There are multiple methods to
take the screenshots on Honor 7x. In this post, I will cover 2 different
methods of how to take screenshot on Honor 7x.
How to take screenshot on Honor 7x using screenshot button
Taking the screenshot on Honor 7x using screenshot button is the simplest way
to take screenshots on Honor 7x. Here is the step by step guide on how to take
screenshot on Honor 7x using screenshot button.

items: Go to the screen which you want to take a screenshot.
Access quick setting by swiping down from the top of the screen.
To view the screenshot, go to the Gallery -> Screenshots.

How to take screenshot on Honor 7x using keys

items: Go to the screen which you want to take a screenshot.
Press and hold both the Power button and the volume down button simultaneously for three seconds, or until you hear the camera shutter sound.
To view the screenshot, go to the Gallery -> Screenshots.

content.content: How to take long screenshot on Honor 7x

items: Go to the screen which you want to take a screenshot.
Access quick setting. Tap on the screenshot.
You will see scroll screenshot button on the preview screen.
Tap on it. It will start taking scroll screenshot or long screenshot.
Tapping on the screen will stop taking the screenshot.
